stories.text:
Sometimes task management ( aka Boards ) can get out of hand, with many columns spanning all across the canvas. That can make the overview of entire project quite difficult. That is where column minimization comes in handy!

I have posted a "How-To" blog post to showcase the feature! https://cogency.io/blog/how-to-minimize-a-column-in-boards-

If anyone wants to try it, please use the FREEMONTH coupon to get 100% off

https://cogency.io

stories.text:
Hello, I hope you are all doing fine ! I am excited to announce you that Jobamax.com beta has been launched and is available for downloading today on Iphone at https://testflight.apple.com/join/Lw2oQr4I

The app has a job board with 30K+ jobs, networking spaces for Gen Z and e-learning platform.

All is free !

I would love to get your feedbacks on the app in order to correct bugs and improve some features.

Let's shape the future of work together !

Regards, Alexandre CEO Jobamax
stories.title: Beta test: Professional social network gen Z
